Package commands

Class ServerCommands

  • java.lang.Object
    • commands.ServerCommands
  • public class ServerCommands
extends java.lang.Object
    The class containing the Server commands following the protocol specified to us in the project description!

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ServerCommands()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.lang.String sALREADYLOGGEDIN()
      The method responsible for returning the alreadyloggedin message which is to be sent by the server to the client to indicate that a user is already logged in.
      static java.lang.String sERROR​(java.lang.String... description)
      The method responsible for returning the ERROR message to be sent to the client in the case of an error.
      static java.lang.String sGAMEOVER​(java.lang.String reason, java.lang.String... winner)
      The method responsible for returning the GAMEOVER message to be sent to the client in the case of a game being over.
      static java.lang.String sHELLO​(java.lang.String description, java.lang.String... extension)
      The method responsible for returning the hello message which is to be sent by the sever to the client.
      static java.lang.String sLIST​(java.lang.String... individuals)
      The method responsible for returning the list message which is to be sent by the server to the client to respond to a list message sent by the client which will contain the list of all connected clients!
      static java.lang.String sLOGIN()
      The method responsible for returning the login message which is to be sent by the server to the client to confirm the login of a user! following the protocol specified
      static java.lang.String sMOVE​(int index, int rotate)
      The method responsible for returning the list message which is to be sent by the server to the client to indicate the move played by the client!
      static java.lang.String sNEWGAME​(java.lang.String p1, java.lang.String p2)
      The method responsible for returning the list message which is to be sent by the server to the client to indicate the start of a new game once it has 2 players in the queue waiting to play a game!
      static java.lang.String sPING()
      The method responsible for returning the PING message which is to be sent by the server to the client to check active connection.
      static java.lang.String sPONG()
      The method responsible for returning the PONG message which is to be sent by the server to the client to check active connection.
      static java.lang.String sQUIT()
      The method responsible for returning the QUIT message which is to be sent by the server to quit the connection to the client.
      static java.lang.String sRANK​(java.lang.String... individuals)

    • Method Detail

      • sHELLO

        public static java.lang.String sHELLO​(java.lang.String description,
                                      java.lang.String... extension)
        The method responsible for returning the hello message which is to be sent by the sever to the client.
        Parameters:
        description - - The server description
        extension - - The extensions the server supports
        Returns:
        a String which contains the hello message to be sent according to the protocol.

      • sLOGIN

        public static java.lang.String sLOGIN()
        The method responsible for returning the login message which is to be sent by the server to the client to confirm the login of a user! following the protocol specified
        Returns:
        a String which contains the login message to be sent according to the protocol.

      • sALREADYLOGGEDIN

        public static java.lang.String sALREADYLOGGEDIN()
        The method responsible for returning the alreadyloggedin message which is to be sent by the server to the client to indicate that a user is already logged in.
        Returns:
        a String which contains the alreadyloggedin message to be sent according to the protocol.

      • sLIST

        public static java.lang.String sLIST​(java.lang.String... individuals)
        The method responsible for returning the list message which is to be sent by the server to the client to respond to a list message sent by the client which will contain the list of all connected clients!
        Parameters:
        individuals - - A string containing all the connected clients
        Returns:
        a String which contains all the connected clients sent according to the protocol specified.

      • sRANK

        public static java.lang.String sRANK​(java.lang.String... individuals)

      • sNEWGAME

        public static java.lang.String sNEWGAME​(java.lang.String p1,
                                        java.lang.String p2)
        The method responsible for returning the list message which is to be sent by the server to the client to indicate the start of a new game once it has 2 players in the queue waiting to play a game!
        Parameters:
        p1 - - The name of player 1
        p2 - - The name of player 2
        Returns:
        a String which tells the client about the start of a new game following the protocol!

      • sMOVE

        public static java.lang.String sMOVE​(int index,
                                     int rotate)
        The method responsible for returning the list message which is to be sent by the server to the client to indicate the move played by the client!
        Parameters:
        index - - The index on the board where the player decided to place a marble
        rotate - - The rotation chosen by the player
        Returns:
        a String which tells the client about the move played by the client following the protocol!

      • sGAMEOVER

        public static java.lang.String sGAMEOVER​(java.lang.String reason,
                                         java.lang.String... winner)
        The method responsible for returning the GAMEOVER message to be sent to the client in the case of a game being over.
        Parameters:
        reason - - The reason for the game being over
        winner - - The winner of the game in case there is one
        Returns:
        a String containing the GAMEOVER message to be sent to the client according to the protocol

      • sPING

        public static java.lang.String sPING()
        The method responsible for returning the PING message which is to be sent by the server to the client to check active connection. The client must immediately respond with a PONG to indicate active connection to the server.
        Returns:
        a String which contains the PING message to be sent according to the protocol

      • sPONG

        public static java.lang.String sPONG()
        The method responsible for returning the PONG message which is to be sent by the server to the client to check active connection. The server sends this responding to a PING message by the client
        Returns:
        a String which contains the PONG message to be sent according to the protocol

      • sQUIT

        public static java.lang.String sQUIT()
        The method responsible for returning the QUIT message which is to be sent by the server to quit the connection to the client.
        Returns:
        a String which contains the QUIT message to be sent according to the protocol

      • sERROR

        public static java.lang.String sERROR​(java.lang.String... description)
        The method responsible for returning the ERROR message to be sent to the client in the case of an error.
        Parameters:
        description - - The description of the error
        Returns:
        a String containing the description of the game
